archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Assess severity of crisis
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Before the Crisis Management process starts. The Crisis Manager role receives an alert either directly from the organization or through other processes as an escalated incident. When Crisis Manager receives the alert, he or she shall carry out the first severity and impact assessment.
If the criteria for crisis response is not fulfilled, the Crisis Manager can de-escalate the handling back to normal processes without triggering the crisis management workflow.
